subtopics.name: Nature of the Basic Economic Problem
subtopics.description: Understanding the fundamental concept of scarcity and economic decision-making
learningObjectives: Define and explain the concept of scarcity
Understand the relationship between finite resources and infinite wants
Analyze economic decision-making processes of consumers, workers, firms, and governments

subtopics.name: Factors of Production
